source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Art for Beginners: Drawing & Painting With Bold Color
items.headline: Create 9 Step-By-Step Drawing & Watercolor Painting Projects! Designed for New, Beginner, and Young Artists of All Ages.
objectives_summary: Create 9 amazing watercolor paintings.
Participate in an activity that cultivates critical thinking skills, develops hand-eye coordination, and encourages self-expression.
Apply the knowledge gained in this course to create unique masterpieces.

items.title: Learn Copperplate Calligraphy
items.headline: From Basic Strokes to Compositions
objectives_summary: Learn the basic strokes which make up all Copperplate letters
Uppercase and lowercase alphabets
How to properly connect letters and correct spacing

items.title: Make Unique Mosaics for Fun, Decorating and Profit!
items.headline: Construct lasting and unique mosaics! Unleash your imagination and create something permanent, colorful and beautiful!
objectives_summary: Make fantastic and durable mosaics for fun, decorating and profit!
Choose and prepare the tesserae (small bits of materials to make mosaics with)
Fearlessly cut stained glass and tile for use as tesserae

items.title: Beginner Watercolor Painting Course Easy Lighthouse Painting
items.headline: Create an amazing Watercolor Painting your very first time with this easy step by step Artist guided course.
objectives_summary: You will learn simple watercolor techniques to complete a beautiful Lighthouse painting in a few short easy steps.
Learn to layers washes to create stunning rocks and coastal shoreline.
Find out the simple small number of materials needed to complete a stunning painting.

items.title: Figure drawing the Next Level
items.headline: learn to draw the smart way
objectives_summary: Better Visual Analysis of the human figure
Be able to create figure from imagination with more confidence

items.title: Painting Wild Places with Watercolors: Winter's Light

visible_instructors.title: Gary Spetz
visible_instructors.name: Gary
visible_instructors.job_title: Signature Member of the National Watercolor Society

items.headline: Step-by-step instructional videos with a downloadable Color Painting Reference and full-size Traceable Drawing Guide.
objectives_summary: Successfully paint a bold, dynamic, detailed watercolor landscape.
Gain confidence in controlling the sometimes unwieldy characteristic of watercolor.

items.title: Sewing Machine Boot Camp
items.headline: The course that takes the fear out of learning to use your sewing machine.
objectives_summary: know the parts of your machine
how to properly thread and sewing machine
How to make a bobbin

items.title: The Complete Guide to Quilting for the Beginner
items.headline: Learn to create gorgeous quilts; fun to make and keep, sell, or give as gifts
objectives_summary: Complete a quilt- from start to finish!

items.title: Byzantine Iconography Series 2: Drawing the Half-Figure
items.headline: Laying the Foundations for Byzantine Iconography
objectives_summary: Draw hands in various gestures.
Draw a half-figure in the dynamic frontal pose.
Draw a half figure in the 3/4 pose.

items.title: Handbuilt Pottery Techniques and Projects

visible_instructors.title: Mandar Marathe
visible_instructors.name: Mandar
visible_instructors.job_title: Fine Artist, Sculptor, Illustrator, and Engineer

items.headline: Create clay pottery and sculpt various other objects using hand building techniques.
objectives_summary: Create clay pottery using three easy hand building techniques.
Give interesting textures to your objects
Create animals sculptures with ease

items.title: Paint SKIES & CLOUDS in watercolor. Easy tricks to help you.

visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore
visible_instructors.name: Nicola A
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur

items.headline: Do you struggle with painting skies & believable clouds in watercolor paints? Follow this selection of simple techniques
objectives_summary: Students will better understand how to lift off paint in different ways.
Students will learn how to use the white of the paper to create clouds.
Students will be able to adapt what they learn from these sky demonstrations.

items.title: Beginners Acrylic Techniques with Geoff Hutchins

visible_instructors.title: Geoff Hutchins
visible_instructors.name: Geoff
visible_instructors.job_title: English Professional Artist and Tutor Geoff Hutchins

items.headline: Learn to quickly master the essential basics of painting with acrylic
objectives_summary: You will learn many useful techniques for producing acrylic paintings of your own.
No previous experience is required.  By the end of this course you will be able to finish your own paintings with confidence
Learn the basics of composition, blending, perspective and detail.

items.title: Intermediate Fluid Art Techniques with Chameleon Jones
items.headline: Chameleon Cells and Tortoise Cells
objectives_summary: Intermediate Fluid Art Techniques including Chameleon Cells and Tortoise Cells

items.title: Creating Abstract Face – Techniques in Abstract Art Painting

visible_instructors.title: Hobitute  Artists
visible_instructors.name: Hobitute
visible_instructors.job_title: Your art Guru, Artists at Hobitute

items.headline: Complete Techniques of Creating Abstract Painting with Embossed effect – Abstract Face as example.
objectives_summary: The course has several sections and lectures that are being taught by experienced artists who have taken pains to explain even the minute techniques, thus making it very easy for the learner to follow the concepts and practice.
The course also provides the learners different sections for understanding the techniques of creating special effects and building abstract characteristics.

By completing all the sections under this course, the learner would have thoroughly learned the steps to create special effects, layering, embossed effect, and approach to abstract art. This is a very systematic course aimed at intermediates who love to create an abstract art.

items.title: Creativity and relaxation through quilling
items.headline: A comprehensive, step-by-step course & inspiration to jumpstart your paper quilling creative crafting journey.
objectives_summary: You learn to create and read the basic shapes of quilling.
You learn to prepare quilling art pieces on your own.

items.title: How to Use a Painting Knife for Amazing Paintings
items.headline: Easy Techniques to Add Energy and Interest to Your Paintings
objectives_summary: What Painting knives to Use
Easy Painting Knife techniques
How to add energy and interest to paintings
